column2: BRIEF-Core Lab Q1 Revenue $170 Million April 25 (Reuters) - Core Laboratories NV: * CORE LAB REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS: * QTRLY REVENUE OF $170 MILLION, UP MORE THAN 8% YEAR-OVER-YEAR * EXPECTS CONSOLIDATED Q2 2018 REVENUE OF APPROXIMATELY $177 MILLION TO $179 MILLION * EXPECTS AVERAGE Q2 2018 U.S. RIG COUNT TO BE SLIGHTLY UP SEQUENTIALLY, WITH COMPLETION ACTIVITY LEVELS SHOWING MODEST GROWTH * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.57, REVENUE VIEW $170.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.65, REVENUE VIEW $180.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
